hackathon-description-text: START Hack is a 35-hour hackathon in St. Gallen, Switzerland with the aim to foster real technological progress. We bring together tech students from more than 30 countries and universities all over the world, such as MIT, Cambridge, ETH, EPFL and many more. Create innovative products in the focus areas Financial Technology (FinTech), Internet of Things (IoT) and Mobility.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: START Summit Showcase & CHF 500 Microspot voucher
START Summit Showcase & CHF 300 Microspot voucher
START Summit Showcase & CHF 200 Microspot voucher
Railaway voucher for a stay in Switzerland
Blog article about the projects and especially the winner
100 CHF Amazon Elastic Computing Credits and Presenting Product & Findings at Fundbase Annual Investor Conference
Amazon Web Services swag and portable Harddrive

hackathon-description-header: START Hack is a 35-hour hackathon and aims to foster real technological progress. We bring together hundreds of talented tech students from 30 countries and the best universities in the world.
